comment: Easy A. She gives you 100 on every assignment there is no way you can fail this class and it gets you ready for life after college.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Inspirational--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Dominick is very good professor. She provides videos of weekly work and what is required. Her assignments are clear and easy to follow. She is also an easy grader especially for a class like senior seminar.

Quite simply one of the best professors that I have had in 7 years. She is very caring and kind. Dr. Dominick is possibly the best professor that I have had in many semesters. I highly recommend taking her for any course.
Dr. Joanie is GREAT - she makes class interesting, she wants her students to succeed, and she is easy to talk to. This is a great senior seminar class and I would suggest it to anyone!

Prof. Joan, is a gem for real. Wonderful lady, class felt like having your favorite aunt as a teacher. All hw and assignments are online, so when you go to class is pretty much to hang out with her and listen to alumni show you easy ways to improve yourself and get a good job after graduating. I wish I could take her for all my classes.
Dr. Dominick is hilarious. She does not give tests/quizzes/papers in her class; it is our "stress-free zone." She cares about her students and wants you to succeed. Take her, you won't regret it!!!

Easy A, but unfortunately this teacher got very annoying. Her website is very hard to follow along, but if you attempt to answer the discussion questions and assignments then you get an A. Very relieved because it was an easy senior seminar, but I do not think I would take her again.

Dr. Dominick is possibly the most encouraging professor ever. She is there to encourage and give you valuable information as a senior and beyond. She is your biggest cheerleader! This class is so refreshing and the only way to do poorly is to not show and do nothing the entire time.

Easy A! The class is so easy there is no way to fail, unless you just never go to class. You will learn a lot in this class, about yourself and how the real world. Total of 10 discussions, and one final project about your college journey & present to the class. Overall, the professor is nice and helpful.MUST TAKE!!

Very nice!! Easy class. This is really to help you once you graduate its not about your grade. Easy to get an A but you learn alot that you will use forever. You learn Publisher, portfolios, resume, interview skills, business start up, networking.
Great professor, very fun and outgoing.  Really cares about her students.  She can be a little annoying at times with clapping and such but over all she is just great.  I def recommend her

I agree with the comments that she is extremely nice, helpful, and I found the class worthwhile, if only it were offered to Fresh/Soph level classes.  She was, however, at times extremely annoying and the constant clapping was ridiculous.  That being said, I would still recommend her class and you'll definitely get a lot out of it.

One of the nicest prof,'s I've ever had! She's always ready to help and happy to just talk! I still speak with her a year later. Absolutely wonderful woman. She's so much fun to work with. I wish all teachers were as amazing as her.
Dr. Joanie is wonderful.  There is nothing negative to say.  Take her class and you will get an easy A!
I am Alumni, class of 1999...Dr. Dominick is absolutely wonderful!

She is the best teacher in the entire world. I mean she made me realize the value in a portfolio to further my academic career. I love Dr. Joanie. She is amazing. Plus, she gives us a pizza, what's not to like about that? She's great. I HIGHLY recommend her to anyone. TAKE HER!
Dr. Joannie is AWESOME!!  I would HIGHLY recomend her class to everyone!! she is very easy, flexible, and helpful.  she is skilled in so many areas and knows what she is talking about!!
